name: Leigh Woods veteran tree walk, Leigh Woods

ai.summary: A 6 km loop through Leigh Woods following shaded forest trails that wind among veteran trees, offering a peaceful, moderately challenging hike with opportunities for photography and wildlife viewing.
ai.terrain_summary: Forest trails with compact earth, exposed roots, and occasional gravel; generally well-defined but uneven in places; some gentle elevation changes and potential mud after rain; parts may include boardwalks.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight; wear sturdy, waterproof footwear; stay on marked paths; watch for slippery roots and muddy sections; bring a map or GPS and a means to call for help; let someone know your plan; supervise children and dogs; carry sufficient water and a light snack; be mindful of wildlife and seasonal closures.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots or shoes with good traction
Small map or offline GPS, and a fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal, with summer offering pleasant temperatures and autumn colors; winter hikes are possible but can be very muddy and slippery.

seo.title: Leigh Woods Veteran Tree Walk – 6 km Moderate Hike in Leigh Woods, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 6 km veteran tree walk through Leigh Woods, UK. Enjoy shaded trails, ancient trees, and tranquil woodland scenery with practical safety tips and gear.
seo.h1: Leigh Woods Veteran Tree Walk – 6 km Moderate Hike
